name: Kashmir Valley Explorer
summary: A beautiful journey through Kashmir's scenic landscapes.
description: Explore Dal Lake, Gulmarg, Pahalgam, and more in this peaceful and refreshing tour.

name: Delhi Historical Walk
summary: Discover the rich history of Delhi.
description: Visit Red Fort, Jama Masjid, Chandni Chowk and other cultural landmarks.

name: Ladakh Adventure Trek
description: Experience Pangong Lake, Nubra Valley and rugged Himalayan terrain.

name: Goa Beach Holiday
description: Enjoy water sports, nightlife and peaceful sunsets on the beaches of Goa.

name: Kerala Backwater Cruise
summary: A soothing cruise through Kerala backwaters.
description: Houseboat stay in Alleppey with authentic Kerala food.

name: Jaipur Royal Heritage Tour
description: Amber Fort, City Palace, Hawa Mahal and traditional Rajasthani culture.

name: Mumbai City Lights Tour
summary: A quick tour of Mumbai’s most iconic places.
description: Explore Marine Drive, Gateway of India, Bandra and Bollywood areas.

name: Rann of Kutch White Desert Tour
summary: Experience the beauty of the white desert.
description: Visit the Rann Utsav, local culture and unique landscapes.

name: Darjeeling Tea Garden Escape
summary: A refreshing tour of Darjeeling's tea gardens.
description: Enjoy Toy Train ride, tea tasting and peaceful hill views.

name: Andaman Island Explorer
summary: Adventure and beaches in the Andaman Islands.
description: Elephant Beach, Radhanagar Beach, scuba diving and more.
